tool_description: Extracts raw pixel data arrays from DICOM files and provides image properties for further analysis or processing.

file_path.description: Path to the DICOM file for pixel data extraction

apply_windowing.description: Apply DICOM window level and width if present

error_messages: No pixel data found: DICOM file does not contain pixel data elements.
Unsupported transfer syntax: Cannot decode pixel data with current transfer syntax.
Memory allocation error: Image too large for available memory. Consider processing smaller regions.
Pixel data corruption: Pixel data appears corrupted or incomplete.
usage: Provide file_path to extract pixel data from DICOM files. Configure normalize_values and apply_windowing based on processing needs.

image_width.description: Width of the image in pixels

image_height.description: Height of the image in pixels

pixel_spacing_x.description: Physical spacing between pixels in X direction (mm)

pixel_spacing_y.description: Physical spacing between pixels in Y direction (mm)

min_pixel_value.description: Minimum pixel value in the image

max_pixel_value.description: Maximum pixel value in the image

extraction_successful.description: Whether pixel data extraction completed successfully
